response.overview: David Aames has it all: wealth, good looks and gorgeous women on his arm. But just as he begins falling for the warmhearted Sofia, his face is horribly disfigured in a car accident. That's just the beginning of his troubles as the lines between illusion and reality, between life and death, are blurred.
response.title: Vanilla Sky

titles.title: 香子兰天空 / 魂离情外天 / 香草天空

results.name: Vanilla Sky 2001 Trailer HD | Tom Cruise | Penelope Cruz | Cameron Diaz
